## OfferV3 interface

Represents a marketplace offer.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface OfferV3
```

## Properties

| Property                                                            | Modifiers | Type                                | Description                                                                                                                                               |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [asset](./sdk.offerv3.asset.md)                                     |           | [NFTMetadata](./sdk.nftmetadata.md) | The asset to buy.                                                                                                                                         |
| [assetContractAddress](./sdk.offerv3.assetcontractaddress.md)       |           | string                              | The address of the asset being sought.                                                                                                                    |
| [currencyContractAddress](./sdk.offerv3.currencycontractaddress.md) |           | string                              | The address of the currency offered for the NFTs.                                                                                                         |
| [currencyValue](./sdk.offerv3.currencyvalue.md)                     |           | CurrencyValue                       | The <code>CurrencyValue</code> of the listing. Useful for displaying the price information.                                                               |
| [endTimeInSeconds](./sdk.offerv3.endtimeinseconds.md)               |           | number                              | The end time of the offer.                                                                                                                                |
| [id](./sdk.offerv3.id.md)                                           |           | string                              | The id of the offer.                                                                                                                                      |
| [offerorAddress](./sdk.offerv3.offeroraddress.md)                   |           | string                              | The address of the creator of offer.                                                                                                                      |
| [quantity](./sdk.offerv3.quantity.md)                               |           | string                              | <p>The quantity of tokens to buy.</p><p>For ERC721s, this value should always be 1 (and will be forced internally regardless of what is passed here).</p> |
| [status](./sdk.offerv3.status.md)                                   |           | [Status](./sdk.status.md)           | Whether the listing is CREATED, COMPLETED, or CANCELLED.                                                                                                  |
| [tokenId](./sdk.offerv3.tokenid.md)                                 |           | string                              | The ID of the token.                                                                                                                                      |
| [totalPrice](./sdk.offerv3.totalprice.md)                           |           | string                              | The total offer amount for the NFTs.                                                                                                                      |
